page.title: 07HOUSING ESTATES
page.content: THE HOUSES NEAREST TO OUR SCHOOL ARE PREDOMINANTLY SEMI-DETACHED COUNCIL HOUSES BUT THERE ARE A FEW PRIVATE HOUSES SCATTERED AROUND ESPECIALLY NEAR WOMBWELL. SOME FAMILIES ARE NOW BUYING THEIR COUNCIL HOUSES BUT WHERE RENT IS PAID IT IS ABOUT Â£2O PER WEEK.MOST OF THEM HAVE 3 BEDROOMS, A BATHROOM, A LIVING ROOM, A FRONT ROOM, AND A KITCHEN, AND SOME HAVE OUTSIDE TOILETS AND COAL PLACES. THEY ALL HAVE GARDENS BUT MANY ARE LEFT IN A ROUGH STATE. OF THE 126 FAMILIES IN OUR SCHOOL WE DISCOVERED THAT:-12O HAD COLOUR TELEVISION; 99 MONO TELEVISION, 92 FREEZERS, 115 REFRIGERATORS, 3O GAS OVEN, 96 ELECTRIC OVENS, 36 MICRO WAVE OVENS, 67 VIDEO RECORDERS, 1OO MUSIC CENTRES, 1O6 TELEPHONES, 82 CENTRAL HEATING, 96 OPEN FIRES, 126 WASHING MACHINES, 71 TUMBLE DRYERS.
